name: Granny House Horror Survival
description:
A terrible dark hospital where crazy grandma is a nurse. From here you need to escape as soon as possible!

Remember that grandma did not notice you, hold your breath!

Find items to solve the puzzle and escape from the hospital! Remember, at any moment grandma can catch you.

Horror Granny: House Survival - a game that inspires fear and horror! See if you can pass it.
